scripts.build:prod: rm -rf docs/* && cp -a src/alpha/dist/. docs/federatedWebpackReactComponents/ && cp -a src/beta/dist/. docs/federatedWebpackReactComponents/ && cp src/public/prod.html docs/federatedWebpackReactComponents/index.html
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf tmp/* && cp -a src/alpha/dist/. tmp && cp -a src/beta/dist/. tmp && cp src/public/dev.html tmp/index.html
